subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Jermaine O’Neal’s head is spinning from the wholesale changes the Indiana Pacers made in this week’s trade that sent his friends, Al Harrington and Stephen Jackson, to the Golden State Warriors.
snippet: Jermaine O’Neal’s head is spinning from the wholesale changes the Indiana Pacers made in this week’s trade that sent his friends, Al Harrington and Stephen Jackson, to the Golden State Warriors.
